content: वटः [वट्-अच्] {@--1@} The fig-tree; अयं च चित्रकूटयायिनि वर्त्मनि वटः, श्यामो नाम <ls>U. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 53.</ls> {@--2@} A small shell or {%cowrie%}. {@--3@} A small ball, globule, pill. {@--4@} A round figure, a cipher. {@--5@} A kind of cake. {@--6@} A string, rope ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). {@--7@} Equality in shape.
